string.text: I know a place where this guy hides all his loot. I'll happily tell you where it is, if you're happy to pay for it...
That's a little steep for what could be an empty stash by now. No, thanks
Thank you. Here's the information. Pleasure to do business...
Thank you. I look forward to what I may find
